ImageDescription.description: Detailed description of the pig drawing including visual characteristics, style, and notable features

VerticalPlacement.description: Vertical placement of the pig drawing: Top, Middle, or Bottom

Orientation.description: Orientation of the pig: Left, Right, or Front

DetailCount.description: Number of small detail objects detected in the drawing

LegCount.description: Number of legs visible in the pig drawing

EarSize.description: Size of the pig ears: Large or Normal

TailLength.description: Relative tail length from 0 to 1, where 0 is no tail and 1 is very long tail
